attack.translate: атака, нападение, атаковать, нападать, нападающий, штурмовой
examples: She had a sudden heart attack.
We received an order to attack.
She had an attack of hiccups.
Acid attacks metals.
The attack began at dawn.
Our troops attacked the enemy.
His plan of attack was misguided
The enemy attacked treacherously.
An attack of fever carried him off.
He made a blistering attack on his opponent.
Rust is attacking the metal.
He suffered a mild heart attack.
a team with a good passing attack
the ferocity of the lion's attack
He suffered a major heart attack.
There is a threat of nuclear attack.
Stress can bring on an asthma attack.
They live in constant dread of another attack.
They were at the head of the attack.
The government has come under attack.
the army's plan of attack
The troops attacked at dawn.
the victim of a racist attack
the second prong of the attack
open to attack by the elements
They launched a deadly attack.
a preemptive attack by the army
The troops repulsed the attack.
He suffered a minor heart attack.
a venomous attack on his character
example_translate: У неё внезапно случился сердечный приступ.
Приступ лихорадки свёл его в могилу.
Он яростно набросился на своего оппонента.
команда с хорошим пасовым нападением (об американском футболе)
Они живут в постоянном страхе, еще одной атаки.
Они были во главе этой атаки. / Они возглавили нападение.
